content: Loong Balm is the final of the Drinks in Black Myth: Wukong that can be found in the world. The last one, the A Thousand Days Inebriation, is purchased from the Shen Monkey Vendor.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Balm.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Balm'.
The content is as follows:
Loong Balm is the final of the Drinks in Black Myth: Wukong that can be found in the world. The last one, the A Thousand Days Inebriation, is purchased from the Shen Monkey Vendor.
